features: 900 fill Nikwax Hydrophobic Down™: Absorbs 90% less water and dries 3 times faster without using dangerous PFCs.
Unrivaled Packability: Lightweight materials and precise design pack into a minimalist compression sack.
SynergyLink™ Connectors: Integrate the quilt with a pad for optimal efficiency and comfort; removable for versatility.
Draft Protected: Perimeter side baffles and snap neck closure eliminate unwanted drafts.
Responsible Down Standard Certified: Certification that ensures that the waterfowl in the down supply chain are treated humanely.
Compression sack and storage sack included
Fill material: 900 Fill Goose Nikwax Hydrophobic Down, RDS
Shell fabric: 10D Nylon Ripstop w/ DWR
